attributes.action: Request more rented suitable housing built for people with disabilities.
attributes.additional_details: It's painful for her to go upstairs to bed, or shower. We had to paid for and got a downstairs toilet to save her more unessasary pain. I know she isn't alone in this, they are a lot waiting in my home town, let alone the rest of the country.
attributes.background: My disabled mother has been waiting over two years for a two bed bungalow as I live with them to help care for her. There is a lack of these houses available through local councils and housing associations, especially under 55 years of age.
